articles.content:
Thorpe comes in place of Stuart Law © Getty
Graham Thorpe has been named Afghanistan's head coach and will take over Stuart Law, who was acting as the interim coach. Afghanistan Cricket Board appoin… [+723 chars]

articles.title: Chris Gayle Starts Training, Hints At Returning In The IPL In 2023 - Cricket Addictor
articles.description: Chris Gayle, who is popularly known as Universe Boss, has hinted at his comeback in the Indian Premier League (IPL) 2023.
articles.content:
T20 legend Chris Gayle, who is popularly known as Universe Boss, has hinted at his comeback in the Indian Premier League (IPL) 2023, which will be the 16th edition of the tournament.
